item.title: Apply for access to a GWS
item.description:
This article explains how to apply for access to a GWS from the JASMIN account portal.

Step 1 : Sign in into your JASMIN accounts portal  . Navigate to the JASMIN services tab of the portal then select the group workspaces from “Discover services” menu. You can search or browse a list of available GWSs. For example here the search for GWS with name containing CEDA, resulted in two GWSs.

item.title: Approving requests for access roles
item.description: Managers of JASMIN resources will also be set up to approve applications from members of the JASMIN user community wishing to use particular resources. The following video tutorial explains the approval process using the JASMIN Accounts Portal.
